member.name: M:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.ESWLogic.HostExecutionSession(System.String)
member.summary: Interacts with the DSI SQL Database to host the session, and then Environment.Exit()s.

member.name: F:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.ESWLogic.IgnoreLogEvents_
member.summary: Indicates that LogEvents should not be processed for the time-being, because they are only being caused as a result of attempting to Log a previous Event. This prevents the infinite loop of [Log an Event] → [Log the fact that you're logging an Event] → ...

member.name: P:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DocScript.Interactive.ESWorker.DSIBuiltInFunctions.All_DSI_BuiltInFunctions(System.String)
member.summary: DocScript Interactive BIFs - accessible via calling DSI_{BIFName}() in the DocScript DSI Program Source.
